skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Kamikaze-class destroyer Matsukaze! I was in Destroyer Division 5 along with my sisters. We're a little outdated compared to something like the Mutsuki-class, but we won't let any newer classes beat us when it comes to combat or escorts! ...Sigh... I wonder how Asakaze's team will fare without me...
skins.acquisition: This is the fleet everyone's in, right? Seems pretty rowdy~ I'm Matsukaze! Nice meeting you!
skins.login: You can't fight on an empty stomach, Commander! I made lots and lots of food, so eat to your heart's content!
skins.details: I wonder how my sisters are doing... I'm worried about them...
skins.secretaryIdle1: This thing I've got? It's what's known as a ladle. Yeah, if it was a little smaller you could even serve tea with it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This place is lacking in greenery... We should put some potted plants in here, Commander~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ahhh, the smell of laundry hung out to dry in the sun~ Isn't it great?
skins.secretaryTouch: Yeah? Are you feeling tired? Then wait just a moment, I've finished making some snacks!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! ...Commander, sit right over there! You need to be scolded!

skins.shipDescription: There we go... My fan is too big, and I'm not used to carrying it around yet... Ah, right, come here for a sec, Commander~ I'll fan you with some cool air~ Come on now, no need to be shy~
skins.acquisition: There we go... My fan is too big, and I'm not used to carrying it around yet... Ah, right, come here for a sec, Commander~ I'll fan you with some cool air~ Come on now, no need to be shy~
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! How are you? Hungry? Then have a seat, I'll go get you something to eat!
skins.details: I doubt this fan will be of any use when it gets cold...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I think this thing will be handy for drying clothes or futons out in the sun! Mhm, I think I'll test it right now!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, look! There's a big "matsu" written on my fan! Mhm, I have to say I'm quite fond of it~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Umm... have you heard about "work-life balance"? It's bad to rest too much, but it's not good to work too much either.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? Are you hungry? Or do you want me to fan you?
